summary: Changes the way unarmed combat works in Skyrim Redone.
descriptionHtml:
This mod overhauls how unarmed combat works in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]Skyrim Redone[/url].

The "Unarmed" weapons are no longer visible in the player inventory and the right-handed unarmed combat item is now automatically equipped when the right-hand becomes empty. This provides the benefit of the unarmed item no longer having to be manually equipped and freeing up a hotkey slot for quick access (as well as one less item taking up space in the menu), although, as a consequence,Â left-handed unarmed combat neither counts towards light weapon skill-usage nor does it benefit from perks

The Sorcerer's Fury perk has been reworked so that instead of being able to enchant the fist weapons at an altar, a daily-use power has been given to the player so that the right-handed unarmed attack can be given powerful enchantments of any of the following:

[list]
[*][size=2]Absorb Health[/size]
[*][size=2]Fear[/size]
[*][size=2]Fire Damage[/size]
[*][size=2]Frost Damage[/size]
[*][size=2]Paralysis[/size]
[*][size=2]Spark Damage[/size]
[*][size=2]Soul Trap[/size]
[/list][size=2]
The mod also includes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27627/?]Gauntlet Armor - Unarmed Blocking[/url] by Cheshyr.[/size]


[u]REQUIREMENTS
[/u]
[list]
[*]Dawnguard
[*]Dragonborn
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]Skyrim Redone[/url]
[/list]
